decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 21/03225/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:KIN96 P2 102 Proposed Site PlanKIN96 P2 103 Proposed Ground Floor PlanKIN96 P2 104 Proposed First Floor PlanKIN96 P2 105 Proposed Second Floor PlanKIN96 P2 106 Proposed Cellar Floor PlanKIN96 P2 107 Proposed Roof PlanKIN96 P2 108 Proposed Front NW ElevationKIN96 P2 109 Proposed Side SW ElevationKIN96 P2 110 Proposed Rear SE Elevation Rev AKIN96 P2 111 Proposed Side NE ElevationKIN96 P2 112 Proposed Section AAKIN96 P2 113 Proposed Section BBKIN96 P2 1114 Existing and Proposed Street Scene ElevationReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/03225/HOU (Erection of single-storey side and rear extension, first floor rear extension and two storey side extension. Raising of flank walls, raising of roof ridge height with chimney stack removal, hip-to-gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 5no main rooflights and 4no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Works to front garden wall and front and rear garden including a new garden wall at the junction with street, new bin store and lean to side storage in alleyway, set behind a marginally raised side access gate and fence) dated 28/02/2022. Amendment to consist of lead clad dormers changed to tile and alterations to fenestration
